item.title: Auto archive action?
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
“After Success” is the setting you are referring to. It is still a setting on each individual action, and a default can be set by Action Group. Details below:

Action "After Success" default configured on Action Groups Tips & Tricks
[after-success] Previous versions of Drafts had a global “after success” setting which controlled the default behavior of actions after they were successfully completed - allowing automatic archiving or trashing of drafts. Actions still have individual settings for “after success”, but the global setting has been removed in favor of defaults inherited from the action group the action resides in. With action groups now enabled as options for the extended keyboard row, it made more sense to be …

With actions now serving as keyboard rows, it makes less sense to have a global setting, so it was removed.
